analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xf803646439b5af31382e9acf9bfe378f3d7d2e15.sol#200-202) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf803646439b5af31382e9acf9bfe378f3d7d2e15.sol#201-202)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xf803646439b5af31382e9acf9bfe378f3d7d2e15.sol#276-283) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf803646439b5af31382e9acf9bfe378f3d7d2e15.sol#278-281)
